attributes.action: Easier access to charge councils for damage to cars becuase of potholes
attributes.additional_details: Make it easier to claim compensation against the councils who fail to upkeep the road to a standard that doesn't break your car or puncture your tyres everytime u drive on it. Its a joke that you expect the working class to pay for this because u carnt keep up the maintenance
attributes.background: Make it easier for the normal working man to charge the councils for not fixing potholes properly around the country. This is damaging our cars that have to meet the standards of being road worthy when the roads aren't!!!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are concerned that it is not easy enough to claim compensation if your vehicle is damaged by a pothole, but it's not clear what you want the Government to do to make it easier to claim compensation. You can find out how to claim compensation if your vehicle has been damaged by a road here: https://www.gov.uk/claim-for-damage-to-your-vehicle

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to make it easier to claim compensation for damage caused by potholes.
